summary.para: Contains interfaces and classes that implement EasyTest functionality.
Stores options for a tested Blazor application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.WinApplicationOptions.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified settings.

member.param: Specifies the name of the WinForms application. This name is used to differentiate between different applications.
Specifies the fully qualified name of the application’s executable file.
Specifies a number of the communication port used by EasyTest when testing the application.
Specifies the command-line arguments passed to the application when it is started.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.WinApplicationOptions.Arguments

summary.para: Gets the command-line arguments passed to the application when it is started.

member.value: The command-line arguments passed to the application when it is started.

summary.para: Gets the communication port number that will be used by EasyTest when testing the application.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.WinApplicationOptions.FileName

summary.para: Gets the fully qualified name of the application’s executable file.

member.value: The fully qualified name of the application’s executable file.

summary.para: Gets the name of the WinForms application. This name is used to differentiate between different applications.
